descriptions: Student demonstrates no understanding of personal boundaries.
Student demonstrates a minimal understanding of personal boundaries; struggles to define what they are.
Student demonstrates a basic understanding of personal boundaries, can provide a general definition but lacks depth.
Student demonstrates a satisfactory understanding of personal boundaries, can define them and provide some examples.
Student demonstrates a strong understanding of personal boundaries, can clearly define them and provide relevant examples related to privacy, safety, and expression of emotions.
Student demonstrates an excellent understanding of personal boundaries, can articulate them with clarity, provides insightful examples, and explains the nuances of boundaries in different contexts.
Student does not recognize the importance of setting personal boundaries.
Student vaguely acknowledges the importance of setting personal boundaries but cannot explain why.
Student identifies the importance of setting personal boundaries in a limited way, perhaps only mentioning one aspect (privacy, safety, or expression of emotions).
Student explains the importance of setting personal boundaries, covering two aspects: privacy, safety, and/or expression of emotions.
Student comprehensively explains the importance of setting personal boundaries, covering all three aspects: privacy, safety, and expression of emotions.

Student provides a nuanced and insightful explanation of the importance of setting personal boundaries, including the impact on overall well-being and relationships, and demonstrates understanding of different contexts.
Student is unable to identify any ways to set personal boundaries.
Student suggests one ineffective or inappropriate way to set personal boundaries.
Student suggests one basic way to set personal boundaries.
Student suggests 2-3 appropriate ways to set personal boundaries.
Student suggests multiple effective ways to set personal boundaries and explains the reasoning behind them.

Student demonstrates a sophisticated understanding of setting personal boundaries, suggests a variety of effective strategies tailored to different situations, and discusses the importance of assertive communication.
